announcements.title: Weekly Maintenance
announcements.summary: The CBHS Minecraft Server goes down briefly once a week for updates and backups.
announcements.body: Every Saturday at around 1:00 AM, the CBHS Minecraft Server will be briefly offline for routine maintenance. Expected downtime is about 30 minutes. Please finish any major activities before then.

announcements.title: Season 1 Launch
announcements.body: Season 1 kicks off our modded server, date is a temporary placeholder. Get ready soon!

announcements.title: Voting Now Open!
announcements.summary: Suggest and vote on server features and rules.
announcements.body: We have opened up voting for server features and rules! Head over to the Vote page to participate and help shape the future of the CBHS Minecraft Server.

announcements.title: Dont forget to tell us your Minecraft username!
announcements.summary: We need your Minecraft username to whitelist you on the server.
announcements.body: Make sure to provide your Minecraft username when signing up for the server so we can whitelist you! Without it, you won't be able to join and play.
